vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀπρό-σκοπος, ον,

__B unseeing, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__B.II unexplored, ὁδός[LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: blameless, clear; not causing one to stumble, not giving offence
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
blameless, clear; not causing one to stumble, not giving offence
not stumbling, or jarring; metaphorically not stumbling or jarring against moral rule, unblameable, clear, Acts 24:16; Phil. 1:10; free from offensiveness, not causing one to stumble, not giving offence 1Cor. 10:32*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: libre de culpa, intachable ; inofensivo ; limpio (de conciencia)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 無損的,無指摘的 (徒 24:16; 腓 1:10)
2) 不冒犯人的 (林前 10:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 无损的,无指摘的 (徒 24:16; 腓 1:10)
2) 不冒犯人的 (林前 10:32)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không chê trách; không trách móc
